Title: XNA in WPF
Description: WPF Canvas component that allows hosting and presentation of an XNA window from within WPF applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XNA in WPF

This is a public posting of the CodeProject XNA integration inside WPF, and further extended by Jacob Griffith to work in XNA 4.0.

I've added some additional code to handle HiDef resources.
